name: Turquoise Ginger Necklace
description:
This beautiful Turquoise charm necklace hangs with our larger ginger charm. Sits on a 16" gold filled bead chain.

Audra Collection

ps-Stones a real and will very in shape and size

name: Gemstone Rose Bud Necklace
description:
This 16" necklace from our Audra Collection features a 12mm white crystal set in gold. Our small hanging rose bud charm hangs along the larger pendant. Gold filled bead chain. 

Also comes in a Green Amethyst or a Smokey Quartz

name: Rose Flower Hoops
description: From our Audra Collection these Rose flower hoops are set with Smokey Topaz, White Topaz or Blue Topaz.  They're are 18K gold Vermeil with a Sterling Silver ear stem.

name: Floating Rose Bud hoops
description:
From our Audra Collection these large Rose Bud hoops feature 3 floating rose buds in these beautiful hoops earrings. 

1" Length
Gold Vermeil

name: Moonstone and Love Disk Necklace
description:
Part of our Audra Collection-Genuine moonstone with LOVE stamp necklace. Choose between round of square love charm. Comes on a 16" gold filled chain. 

Stones are natural and might very in shape per order.

name: Dandelion/Rose Bud Initial Necklace
description:
Part of our Audra Collection this gold filled charm necklace features a Blue Topaz (comes in other gemstones) with a small Rose Bud charm and an initial of your choice. 

Please add Initial choice in the comment section.

Also comes in Citrine, White Topaz or Smokey Quartz

name: Water Lily Love Necklace
description:
This is our Water Lily love charm necklace from the Audra Collection. A silver disc stamped with the word 'Love' sits with a Water Lily charm set with sparkling black spinel gemstones. 

16" silver bead chain

Also available in Black diamonds or gold vermeil

name: Gold Turquoise XO Charm bracelet
description: From our Audra Collection- This beautiful charm bracelet features a gold filled chain with a Turquoise stone charm. We layer it with a small gold stamped XO charm. Clasp allows for easy sizing.

name: 14K Confetti Gemstone Earrings
description:
Beautiful 14K Confetti earrings. Gemstone is 10x7 and comes in Amethyst, Blue Topaz, Citrine or Smokey Topaz. These are truly every day earrings that can be worn day or night.

Hangs 1" down. Hand Brushed Finish.

name: Sterling Silver Gemstone Sunflower Necklace
description:
This was one of my first designs and still is one of the most popular. This large, 3 1/2" across Sterling Silver Sunflower come with a Rose Cut gemstone in Amethyst, Blue Topaz, Smokey Topaz, Citrine, Turquoise, or Black Spinel.

It comes on a 36" large round link chain with clasp that can be doubled to wear short or long.

Hang Brushed

name: Blue Sapphire Water Lily Necklace
description:
16" Chain with our beautiful Water Lily set with Blue or Pink Sapphires. We love the way this sits on your neck right at 15" so you can layer with your other necklaces.  

Will size to your specifications.

name: 14K Pansy Earrings
description: Approx 1 1/4 long these everyday earrings are part of our pansy collection. This sale is for our solid 14K gold Pansy Earrings but we also make them in all diamonds or Sterling Silver.

name: Sundrop Earrings, 14K Gold, Fancy Colored Sapphires and Diamonds
description: Treat your ears to a drop of sunshine with our sparkling Sundrop earrings.  Swaying playfully from their wires, these delicate drops are made of solid, hand-finished 14KT yellow gold and are each dressed with a flower made up of four shimmering sapphire petals and a small diamond center.  The stones are bezel-set, and come in your choice of pink or yellow sapphires, for an undeniably feminine style.

name: Peony Hoop Earrings, 14K Gold and Diamond
description: Brighten your day with this darling hoop design, adorned with a special little pick-me-up...our diamond Peony accents.  Each earring features it's own happy little flower made of six dazzling VS clarity diamonds, set atop a textured, hand-finished hoop.  The solid 14KT gold, fixed post earring keeps the sparkle front and center, so every time you see them you'll have something to smile about!

name: LSJ Hoop Earrings with Lily, 14K Gold and Diamonds
description:
Our signature LSJ hoop earring has blossomed!  We've added a solid 14KT gold Lily with one bezel set rose cut diamond in the center to the top of each hoop.  Hanging approximately 3" long, these versatile earrings are hand-finished in a brushed texture...and they go with absolutely everything, you'll never want to take them off!

Check out the rest of our LSJ hoops to choose your favorite flower. Available in 14KT white or yellow gold.  Approximately .11 carats total diamond weight.

name: LSJ Hoop Earrings with Petunias, 14K Gold and Diamond
description:
We've dressed up our signature LSJ hoop earring with a darling new Petunia flower and it's center-set rose cut diamond.  Hanging approximately 3" long, these solid 14KT gold earrings are hand-finished in a brushed texture...and they are so versatile, you'll never want to take them off!

Check out the rest of our LSJ hoops to choose your favorite flower. Available in 14KT white or yellow gold. VS clarity diamonds total .11 carats.

name: LSJ Hoop Earrings, 14K Gold and Diamond
description:
One of our most popular designs, our signature LSJ hoop earring makes a fabulous gift for the most deserving woman in your life...especially if that's you!  

This version features a bezel-set diamond on each hoop, and hangs approximately 3" long.  Made of solid 14KT gold, with a hand-finished brushed texture, they're fun, flirty and so versatile...you'll never want to take them off!

Check out the rest of our LSJ hoops to choose your favorite style. Available in 14KT white or yellow gold. Faceted white diamond total .12 carats.  

Also available with three diamonds per hoop!

name: LSJ Hoop Earrings with Marigold Accent, 14K Gold and Diamond
description:
Our diamond Marigold earrings lends a more sophisticated air to our blossoming collection of signature LSJ hoop earring.  This stunningly feminine design showcases our teardrop shaped, hand-brushed hoop as it dangles from a sparkling diamond flower. Hanging approximately 3" long and made of solid 14KT gold, these are a fun and flirty, and elegant enough for any occasion!

Our diamond Marigold has .14 carats total of fully-faceted white diamonds, set in 14KT white or yellow gold. Check out the rest of our LSJ hoops to choose your favorite flower.

name: LSJ Hoop Earrings with Wildflower, 14K Gold
description:
A stand out from our bouquet of signature LSJ hoop earring, these blossoming beauties feature a playful Wildflower at the top of each teardrop hoop. Hanging approximately 3" long, they're made of solid 14KT gold, with a hand-finished brushed texture. They're fun, flirty and so versatile...you'll never want to take them off!

Check out the rest of our LSJ hoops to choose your favorite flower. Available in 14KT white or yellow gold.

name: LSJ Hoop Earrings with Ginger Flower, 14K Gold
description:
We've jazzed up our signature LSJ hoop earring by adding an adorable Ginger Flower to the top.  Hanging approximately 3" long, these solid 14KT gold earrings are hand-finished in a brushed texture...and they are so versatile, you'll never want to take them off!

Check out the rest of our LSJ hoops to choose your favorite flower. Available in 14KT white or yellow gold.

name: Ivy Earrings, 14K Yellow Gold
description:
Our new Ivy Earrings feature a single gold flower in front of the decidedly ladylike lattice pattern. The 14KT yellow gold beauties dangle approximately 1/2" from the ear.

If you want to brighten up your garden with a touch more sparkle, have a look at our diamond flower version, too!

name: Petunia Earrings with Pink Sapphires, 14K Yellow Gold
description:
Our brand new Petunia Collection has blossomed this season!  

These delicate floral earrings are approximately 1/2" long and each feature a shimmering pink sapphire, accentuated by the hand-finished brushed texture of the 14KT gold petals. 

Also available with rose cut diamonds.

name: Petunia Earrings with Rose Cut Diamond, 14K Yellow Gold
description:
Our brand new Petunia Collection has blossomed this season!  

These delicate floral earrings are approximately 1/2" long and each feature a sparkling 2.5mm rose cut white diamond, accentuated by the hand-finished brushed texture of the 14KT gold petals. 

Total diamond weight = .12 carats.  

Also available with pink sapphires.

name: Petunia and Gemstone Earrings, 14K Yellow Gold and Diamond
description: Make a statement with these dangling floral beauties!  Two sparkling gemstones, in your choice of citrine or blue topaz, are wrapped in gold wire and set above and below our Petunia flower, set with a 2.5mm rose cut diamond in the center.  These 14KT yellow gold earrings hang approximately 2" long, and fully articulated allowing them to swing and sway so the faceted gemstone to catch light from every angle...simply stunning!

name: Lily Earrings, 14K Yellow Gold and Diamonds
description:
These Lily earrings are not just beautiful, they're also a lot of fun to wear!  They swing in an ultra-feminine style, featuring our 14KT yellow gold Lily, set in the center with one VS clarity diamond.  The flower dangles from a round hoop crafted from square wire, and the entire design is finished with a hand-brushed texture.  

Total diamond weight is .12 carats, and each earring hangs approximately 1 1/4" long.  Also available with two diamonds per Lily, or in 14KT white gold.

Pictured below as seen on USA Network's "White Collar".

name: Ginger Flower and Dandelion Earrings, 14K Yellow Gold
description:
Brighten up your holiday party wardrobe with these fabulously festive earrings!  A solid 14KT yellow gold Ginger flower is featured either at the top or in between two dazzling bezel set gemstones.  Hand-finished with our hugely popular Dandelion, and available in various combinations of citrine, blue topaz and smoky quartz in faceted round and pear cuts, these earrings can be custom ordered so each element is arranged to reflect your personal style.

Dangling approximately 2 1/2" long; custom color combinations available upon on request.

name: Dandelion Gemstone Earrings, 14KT Yellow Gold
description:
These darling, dangling earrings deliver maximum sparkle.  Set in a thick handcrafted 14KT yellow gold bezel, each pear shaped gemstone hangs approximately 1/2" from the ear.  Available in your choice of blue topaz, citrine, smoky topaz or amethyst. 

Also available in sterling silver.

name: Dandelion Gemstone Earrings, Sterling Silver
description:
These darling, dangling earrings deliver maximum sparkle.  Set in a thick bezel of hand-brushed sterling silver, each pear shaped gemstone hangs approximately 1/2" from the ear.  Available in your choice of blue topaz, citrine, smoky topaz or amethyst. 

Also available in 14KT yellow gold.

name: Orchid Necklace, 14K Yellow Gold, Gemstone and Diamond
description:
Designed in 14KT yellow gold with cabochon gemstone petals and a VS clarity diamond in the center, these delightful Orchid necklaces are becoming a fast favorite among our loyal clientele.  

The flower is fixed on a 15" chain, so it can be stylishly layered with your other necklaces.  Or, if you'd like to layer a bouquet of Orchids, please email us to order multiple necklaces in varied lengths.  Available in your choice of garnet, blue topaz, amethyst, citrine or turquoise. 

Approximately diamond weight is .06 carats.

name: Daisy Necklace, Sterling Silver and Gemstone
description:
Ask and you shall receive!  In response to an overwhelming number of requests, we've created a sterling sliver version of our Daisy pendant, and gave it a special twist all it's own.  Featuring our hand-finished brushed texture, and a one bezel set oval gemstone in the center, our new Daisy pendant hangs from a 16" sterling silver bead chain.  

You can choose blue topaz, white topaz or amethyst...but this bold yet feminine flower is such an affordable indulgence, you'll have the perfect excuse to start a new collection, and pick up all three!

Oval or Round gemstone available

name: Sweet Pea Sapphire Rings, 14K Yellow or White Gold
description:
Available in a rainbow array of fancy colored faceted sapphires, each stone in our Sweet Pea rings is adorned with a beaded border that continues around it's band.  Designed with versatility in mind, they stack perfectly together, so you can wear them solo or combine your favorite colors for a look that's all your own.  These delectable rings will also sweeten your style when worn with any band you already have!

Choose from pink, blue, yellow, orange or green sapphires in 14KT white or yellow gold, each with our signature hand-applied brushed finish. 

Our standard size 7 can be resized upon request.

name: Poppy Gemstone Rings, 14K White or Yellow Gold
description:
Our fresh and modern Poppy rings are as happy as the flowers that inspired them! 
 
The faceted bezel set gemstone is available in your choice of citrine, amethyst, and blue or smoky topaz, surrounded by polished bead "petals", that add fun and feminine detailing to this substantial piece.  It's a fabulous "statement" ring that really POPS for every day wear or special occasions alike.  Designed in either 14KT white or yellow gold.

name: Gerber Rings, 14K Yellow Gold, Gemstone and Diamonds
description:
Our most popular ring is this special asymmetrical Gerber design.  A large checkerboard cut gemstone is set in 14KT yellow gold and accentuated on one side by a delicate diamond flower.  Choose from stunning rutilated quartz, blue topaz, amethyst, citrine or smoky topaz.  Each color looks gorgeous on it's own, but they're even better stacked in alternating directions, with the diamond flowers joining in the center.

Approximately .12 carats total diamond weight.
